string.name: watering_needs_prefix
string.translation_description: Prefix for the text describing how often a plant should be watered. Used in combination with watering_needs_suffix.

item.translation_description: Suffix for the text describing how often a plant should be watered, singular. Used in combination with watering_needs_prefix: 'Watering needs: every day'.
Suffix for the text describing how often a plant should be watered, plural. Used in combination with watering_needs_prefix: 'Watering needs: every 8 days'.

string.translation_description: Prefix for the text indicating when the plant should next be watered. Used in combination with watering_next_suffix.

item.translation_description: Suffix for the text indicating when the the plant should next be watered, singular. Used in combination with watering_next_prefix: 'Last watered on May 24, 2018 - water tomorrow.'.
Suffix for the text indicating when the the plant should next be watered, plural. Used in combination with watering_next_prefix: 'Last watered on May 24, 2018 - water in 8 days.'.
